[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1476023831779{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”2 Days of SEO Workshop” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1603879726764{margin-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”title-heading nexa-bold”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]SEO Workshop: Topics covered will be:
• Understanding Search Engine
• On-Page SEO
• Meta Fields
• Link Optimization
• Robots.txt, Sitemap.xml
• Alt images
• Off-Page SEO
• Backlink creation
• Directory/ Classified submission
• Article and Blog submission
• Social Media Optimization
• Assignments
• Real-time case study

Read more


Support:
1. 5 days of email support available to answer the queries.
2. Consultancy Services available (charged separately).
3. The course will be interactive with Q&A slot included.

Payment Terms:
1. Advance Payment. Once the payment is done will not be refunded.
2. In case you miss the lecture will reschedule as per the next available slot.

Read less

Discounted Amount : Rs 3000 – For the first few registrations
Duration : 8 Hours (4 Hrs + 4 Hrs)
